Key: (I'm going to go check on Kurumi.)
Hey, Kurumi. I'm here to help.
Oh, Shido-san. What is the meaning of this?

Oh, well... I think this is my first time seeing
you cook, Kurumi.
Is that so? Then, you'll help me a little?

Sure. It already smells delicious. What are you
making?
Pot-au-feu.

I see, a soup dish. That seems like it'll
take time.

Not really. If I use a pressure cooker, it won't
take very long.

You have a point... I didn't know you were so
knowledgeable about cooking.
Isn't it only natural as a girl?

I don't know... I was really impressed hearing you
talk about it... Maybe I don't need to help, then?

No. I mean, you're here, I might as well have you
join.
What do you want me to do?
Hmm. Then...
Whoa... Wh-What?
Please don't move.
W-Wait... You're too close.
I'm taking time with your heartbeat, Shido-san.
You don't have to use mine...!

I couldn't find anything that worked. Or, do you
not want to help me?
Well, it's not that...
Hehehe...
S-Stop! Don't put your fingers on my spine!

My, your heartbeat seems to be a little fast now.
It's hard to get an accurate sense of time.

(*Grunt*... This isn't... good. If I'm here any
longer, God knows what she's going to do to me...)
Kurumi! Sorry, I forgot I had to do something!
Oh, already? How unfortunate.
I look forward to your pot-au-feu! Later!
